p: During July and August 2018, sixteen face-to-face interviews were conducted using semi-structured interviews and successive free lists [ 24, 25]. Participant observation was conducted with six informants during seven harvesting walks [ 24]. Interviews took place at the town of Myrina and the villages; Agios Demetrios, Lychna, Agios Ioannis, Atsiki, Fysini, Skandali, Kallithea, Kontopouli, Panaghia, and Moudros.
